name: Human
description: Found throughout the multiverse, humans are as varied as they are numerous, and they endeavor to achieve as much as they can in the years they are given.
size: Medium or Small (chosen at character creation)

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: You gain Heroic Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Skillful
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain an Origin feat of your choice. Skilled is recommended.

ability_score_increases.notes_2024: In 2024 rules, ability score increases come from your Background, not your Species.
